Text.Page: The sphere is emitting strange flashes of light.

(You hear an unfamiliar male voice, accompanied by a low buzzing.)

"Isn't it ironic?
Those of you who opposed the Core are now trapped by its power...

How could any true elf resist such magic?

I have been watching you...for a long, long time.
My faith has been rewarded...that armor, those swords suit you well."
(The buzzing continues for a while, then stops.)Touch the sphere.Slowly take your hand away.
